citation.article-title: Sulfurimonas paralvinellae sp. nov., a novel mesophilic, hydrogen- and sulfur-oxidizing chemolithoautotroph within the Epsilonproteobacteria isolated from a deep-sea hydrothermal vent polychaete nest, reclassification of Thiomicrospira denitrificans as Sulfurimonas denitrificans comb. nov. and emended description of the genus Sulfurimonas.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Sulfurimonas denitrificans comb. nov.
Sulfurimonas denitrificans (de.ni.triâ€²fi.cans. N.L. v. denitrifico to denitrify; N.L. part. adj. denitrificans denitrifying).
Basonym: Thiomicrospira denitrificans Timmer-ten Hoor 1975 (Approved Lists 1980).
The description remains as given by Brinkhoff et al. (2005).
